about_the_game:
The bandits rushing in. a lot. For the tomorrow's whiskey, you have to protect the saloon. Give them the bullets of justice and loot their credits for pay of character reforming to buy whiskey and upgrade weapons! Overcoming that all offensive and deal with the final boss, Finally! You can finish your daily routine.

Caution : This game's background is not western era.
Refer : Except some UI controls, All battles can play with just the mouse

Game Features


"Immediate Judgement that trial skipped"
"The end of the my gun is shining and.."


"An acceptance ability given to you"
"Cross through the hardship, To the saloon."


"More whiskey, More ability"
"A proper drinking makes you stronger. Only in game."


"Weapon upgrade for more quick punishment"
"An improved trigger can be pulled much powerful, and the bullet getting stronger. (No)"


"Finally realized justice for boss"
"My bullet will pass trough the evil's heart, At last it goes to my future."

Demo Game Information

  • Fight alone against bandits rushing in!
  • It consists of total 15 waves and the boss appears in each 5 wave.
  • You can select an ability after clear the wave.
  • After wave end, moving to saloon. You can use the credits to buy ability, upgrade the weapons and recover the health
  • Through the lantern in saloon to progress the next wave.
  • Get the victory by clear the final wave!

Controls

  • Mouse Left Button - Fire
  • Mouse Right Button or "R" - Reload
  • Mouse Wheel or "1,2,3,4" - Switching Weapon
  • "ESC" - Game Pause or Resume
  • "`" - Console Open or Close (Not available in demo)

fullgame.name: Marshal: The End of The Western Era

name: Marshal: The End of The Western Era - Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The bandits rushing in, My favorite saloon, A sheriff holding guns that fight alone for tomorrow's whiskey..! To fight desperately against overwhelming offensive until final boss defeated, upgrade weapons and get abilities!
supported_languages: English, Korean, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
